website_summaries.verdict: Pioneer's NEX line delivers an outstanding experience with Apple CarPlay, and the EQ settings let you customize the sound so it's just right.
pros: An incredible value for iPhone owners
Outstanding audio quality, a built-in DVD player, full support for Apple CarPlay, and a low price make this an excellent choice
cons: Lack of support for Android Auto makes this a tough sell for Android phone owners
The software update process is lengthy and complicated

website_summaries.verdict: The best option for adding aftermarket Apple CarPlay to vehicles. Large 6.2" WVGA touchscreen display.
pros: Can integrate with backup camera and steering wheels
Features clear microphone for calls or Apple Siri access

customer_reviews.title: CarPlay for my Jeep
customer_reviews.text: Great inexpensive way to add CarPlay to your vehicle. Uses a double DIN installation. I usedto install in my Jeep Wrangler JK. The upgrade even makes the speakers sound better. The included wired microphone works great with Siri.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Baynes

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I have this unit installed in my 2009 Toyota Yaris and I absolutely love it. The screen is very responsive and the display is bright so there are no issues with visibility during the day. I like being able to customize the illumination color and background. So far, I have had no issues with it and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Abby De Rosas

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to upgrade the radio in my wife’s car and add a backup camera. She uses Spotify a lot off of her iPhone when she drives so I was looking to get Apple CarPlay. The unit is very easy to use and gets the job done. I am also pleased with the backup camera integration into the unit. For the price i am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Its like I got a new car
customer_reviews.text: This made my stock Bose system in my 2012 Nissan Altima coupe sound like a whole new system. It actually blew my mind when i heard the difference. Bass is insane, and head unit gives you a lot of control over the EQ settings and Bass Boost. Screen is very responsive, and Apple Carplay works incredibly well. For the price, you cant beat this head unit. I really like that there is a "Siri" button on the bottom left of the unit, easy access to change songs, navigate, or call someone. Overall, this new radio made me feel like my car is brand new again, I would HIGHLY recommend this to anyone looking to get an aftermarket radio with Carplay.
customer_reviews.author: mat

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this unit.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this unit. There are minor flaws but overall it's very seamless. I use the Apple CarPlay everyday and it's awesome. The EQ is incredible and really allowed me to fine tune everything, I still tweet with it every now and then. You have to hook up the green Parking Brake wire in order for the bluetooth to work, I just ordered the bypass off Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Goindef

customer_reviews.title: Fits in VW Golf GTI MK6
customer_reviews.text: I've had 0 problems with this and my iphone. It auto connects beautifully and the Apple Carplay is a super bonus! Just know that the microphone IS NOT BUILT IN, I didn't see that in the product description. So to be blunt I was super pissed and considering returning this stereo when I found this out. Luckily there is an area in my Golf that fits the microphone, so now it's completely hidden.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Unit worked great for about 5 months. Suddenly started shutting down and restarting and staying powered for only about a minute. No sound when it does restart. Now reading other reviews of this product this seems to be an issue with the unit
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Great value!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very responsive screen, and great screen size. At this price, having Apple Car Play is a steal. Also, the EQ is very great for specifying your audio needs. It also, has bass boost, and a loud mode that is helpful. It easily connects to your iPhone, and has a great phone speaker It's a great value, but could've benefited from another usb and an HDMI.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stereo, parking brake bypass is a pain!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound, amazing functionality. 4 stars because of the parking brake lockout. It’s a pain to install the parking brake switch wire and if you don’t you are unable to play DVD’s or pair Bluetooth. Huge pain. Just ordered a parking brake bypass so I don’t have to mess with it.
customer_reviews.author: dsub

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy this headunit. I bought it for my 08 Sierra and paired it with a Crux Soogm-16 wiring harness to keep all my factory chimes. The headunit has a lot of great features. I like the fact that I can plug my Iphone into the USB port and it almost mirrors my phone using Apple car play. Also another great feature is the customizable background picture! It also boosted my sound system and now my speakers sound great. Nothing negative to say about it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Agave Drinker

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT Companion for 2006 Toyota Tundra DoubleCab
customer_reviews.text: Apple CarPlay is awesome. I wish that I had purchased this unit years ago. I connected this toand routed connections from the rear of this unit to my dash withso that I could easily connect to my iPhone. Having Pandora, GoogleMaps, my phone/contact list, and Podcasts all work flawlessly and having a back-up camera to easily back up to my trailer has been AMAZING. For the price, you just can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Andy in TN

customer_reviews.title: Love using Apple Car Play
customer_reviews.text: Installed this stereo in my 07 Toyota Sequoia. Install was relatively easy once we figured out we needed a harness to connect it to our JBL amplifier. Other route would’ve been to install new speakers and bypass the JBL amp. Our speakers are shot, so I wish we would’ve gone the second route but we will probably will eventually replace speakers. I love using the apple car play on this stereo! It’s so easy it use. I also love that it has a CD player, which I know is old school, but I still use it. We also hooked up a backup camera to it and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: mindy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I had this professionally installed on my 06 4Runner and my daughter loves it. Although I did have to purchase two bypasses for this to play. One bypass for the dvd. And another bypass so that my steering wheel controls worked. Make sure you get those two if you want the dvd and your steering wheel to work. Also get the double din installation package for the 4Runner if that’s your vehicle. Awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Love this Pioneer Unit!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome IPhone Carplay unit! Installed in my 2010 Nissan Xterra, and it is great! As a side note, you may want to buy the Dash and Harness kit plus the Micro-Bypass Parking brake switch (all features will not work unless you wire the parking brake or use this switch). In addition I purchased the dash mount USB/Aux input kit. It looks factory as well (no usb or Aux input chords hanging around).
customer_reviews.author: Michael DeMarr

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Half the settings don't work and radio is not bright enough can barely see the display in the sun
customer_reviews.author: Bejo

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and functionality
customer_reviews.text: FANTASTIC! Put it in my Honda accord and I feel like I have a brand new car. This thing is much better and I could have imagined. I was on the fence about CarPlay, but for road trips and for ease of interaction with your phone it is unmatched. Worth it if you ask me. And when I do not want to use the cord for car play, it seamlessly pairs via BT to my phone and sounds wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Martin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome HU for the price point.
customer_reviews.text: This HU is outstanding for the price! CarPlay works quite well, pioneer’s interface is useful, and the screen quality is good enough to properly see behind me via the reverse cam too. Installation was a breeze as well. (Disclaimer: I used to be an MECP installer when I was in college. If you do not know much about cars, professional installation is highly recommended.)
customer_reviews.author: ILoveLamp

customer_reviews.title: Works well in Mazda 2014 CX-5
customer_reviews.text: Installed this in a Mazda CX-5 and was able to integrate it with the car’s factory harness, USB port, antenna, and steering wheel controls with Mazda specific adapters. (Metra 70-793, Metra AX-TOYUSB 2, Mazda Antenna adapter, Axxess ASWC-1). Our car did not have previous Bluetooth to contend with. Also used the Mazda CX-5 double din Install kit, APPS2Car brake bypass, and Esky car backup camera. Now the car plays dvds, uses Apple CarPlay, connects via usb and/or Bluetooth, and has a reverse camera. Prettty slick. Had to remove some trim pieces on rear tailgate and passenger side for rear camera install but it wasn’t too bad with some forethought and planning.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 17 yr old daughter. She figured out all the features in like 10 minutes and I’m the hero. Not easy to install though and the YouTube videos are not v helpful. Got it installed for less than $100
customer_reviews.author: knowmater

customer_reviews.title: Great radio while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: The radio was awesome for over a year then all of a sudden the USB port stopped working while I was driving. I thought maybe it was my flash drive so I replaced it with another one and still it doesn’t work. I talked to pioneer and tried troubleshooting with one of their technicians and he informed me that the unit needs to be on. I’ve been a loyal pioneer radio customer for years now but I’m starting to second guess if I will continue buying their radios
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes an old car feel new
customer_reviews.text: This made my old minivan feel new again. Apple Car Play was huge. But I love having Spotify and blue tooth calls too. It wasn’t too hard to install, but it did take most of a day for a guy who isn’t especially skilled with electronics or cars. I also hooked it up to a back up camera. Most everything works well. I do have to mess with the brightness from time to time. The “automatic” function doesn’t seem to work consistently. Even the stock speakers sound better. A great upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Borborygmus

customer_reviews.title: 2002 Tacoma. 4 door
customer_reviews.text: 2002 Tacoma 4 door sounds great. Love Apple play. Make sure you select Standard speakers mode,f you don’t,the front speakers won’t work. I called Pioneer and the said my first unit was faulty. It was not. It was from selecting Network speakers. Pick the 1500 NEX. Then back to the 1300 NEX For HD radio. The 1500 NEX unit will bill you $30 dollars in tax. Save your mounting brackets from your stock radio and buy the wire harness Amazon recommended. I cut in Inifinity component speakers. Sounds awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Easy install on a 2005 Silverado
customer_reviews.text: I did have to break out a small section of the factory IP bracket behind the stereo where the factory radio has a pin on the back of it for alignment. I used theSCOSCHE GMSRCL2 2003-UP GM Class 2 Stereo Replacement.... all wires matched & worked great, to get rid of the door gong & backup gong. I opened the small black box & unplugged the speaker from the circuit board. You will probably need the antenna adapter also, GM cars had a small antenna coax & the radio takes one size larger use SCOSCHE MDAB 1988-05 GM Micro/Delco Antenna Adapter; Tip only I will install back up camera & update that.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Great head unit with great sound
customer_reviews.text: So far it works great with the idatalink module to keep the steering wheel controls working. When I use apple CarPlay the steering wheel controls don't work but it's a slight knock against the head unit. Installed on a 2008 scion xb.
customer_reviews.author: Desperado43

customer_reviews.title: Look into everything you need before you order.
customer_reviews.text: This actually made me sad. I was so looking forward to replace it in my van. We never did get to install it due to not having ALL of the proper parts. I didn’t realize upon ordering this that you need to purchase $200 more product to install. Hence, we sent it back & was refunded our money. For future buyers, don’t let this review scare you away from this purchase. Just do your homework to find out exactly what you need before you take apart the car. I didn’t have the budget to purchase all required product to properly install.
customer_reviews.author: Holli Morris

customer_reviews.title: Deck is looks great and functions well
customer_reviews.text: Deck is looks great and functions well. Only problem im having is that i cannot open spotify playlists on my deck and have to go into my phone which defeats the purpose of hands free. Overall, great deck.
customer_reviews.author: Reid

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: I a bit sad on the stereo cause the box shows HD Radio stations but it does not have it on this model it only come on the 1330NEX and there is no remote control you have to purchase it separately, and I found the 1330NEX at Walmart for the same price I paid for the 1300NEX .. and it comes with a remote control and HD Radio plus you get a back up camera included .. I can't believe I did not see it first at Walmart .. oh well ..
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stereo kind of quirky
customer_reviews.text: Leaps and Bounds better than a factory stereo only problem is I have to reset it every month or so and then I have no memory backup. Not sure why it needs to be reset. The screen will just go blank no power whatsoever I hold down the reset button starts working again..? Not sure the issue
customer_reviews.author: charles wright

customer_reviews.title: It’s just excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Could not be happier!! Had some trouble with the backup camera, my fault as I didn’t go into the settings to turn it on. I also didn’t get the bypass harness, I should have cause that locks out certain settings such as the dimmer, and adding photos for a customer background. I grounded the Peking brake cable and that let me access the dimmer setting and more, but I still can’t download a custom image for the wallpaper. I will get the bypass cable and try again. Otherwise I absolutely love the head unit. CarPlay works perfect, sound is amazing, touch screen works great. Highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Super good
customer_reviews.text: This replaced an older Pioneer 7in touchscreen HU and this was a great purchase. The CarPlay integration is awesome and connecting a backup camera to it was really easy, even getting it to switch to the camera automatically when putting the car in reverse (connect the camera signal wire on the unit to the reverse lights). The sound quality is great and it connects to bluetooth devices crazy fast. Like 3-4 times faster than my old Pioneer unit.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly on my 2006 Toyota Matrix. Can beat the price for such quality. Pro: very responsive with apple car play. Con: Doesn’t have the highest resolution. And screen is made from plastic instead of glass like a phone. But with the price like that. I wouldn’t complain too much. And mute button is hard to operate. You need two step process to mute the volume. First press the mute button and then press on screen to mute. Overall: please buy it. You won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonRegular

customer_reviews.title: Looks good sounds good
customer_reviews.text: The sound on this unit (AVH1300) is great. Made my factory speakers sound better. The CarPlay is awesome and the Bluetooth mic for phone calls work on point. It says Sirius XM ready but you’ll never to buy a module for it to work. Also if you want To use your steering control you’ll need to buy a module for that too. All in all I’m happy with and would tell friends it’s worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Difficult Install
customer_reviews.text: The manual clearly states the frame should be included but nope there wasnt one. I had to go out and purchase a kit for an additional $45.00. Im super disappointed with the process of this as other reviews stated that the install was super simple. The actual product works really smooth but the supplies to get the thing in the car were a huge let down
customer_reviews.author: LAEBAE

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Stereo with Apply Car Play
customer_reviews.text: We bought this stereo for our son for his birthday. We wanted him to have the features of Apple Car Play and this works fantastic. Very easy to install and easy to learn how to use. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: khilburger

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Fits great in my 05 Toyota Highlander. No big complaints so far. Just one little headache I have every once in a while is that when connecting my iPhone for CarPlay some apps like (Amazon music, apple podcast) will play but won’t show on the screen. Found that if I restart my phone, it works just fine. I think it might have something to do with the Bluetooth connecting before CarPlay connects, not sure but it’s something I can live with. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mariano

customer_reviews.title: Good radio
customer_reviews.text: Had a guy my friend knew I stall it. Easy installation and it didn’t take long, this probably mostly depends on your car though. Good sound quality and good responsiveness to touch, you need to press though not a soft touch. Sometimes it doesn’t connect when starting the car but this is rare (about 7 times in 2 years). Gives my 03 an updated look and feel.
customer_reviews.author: David Price

customer_reviews.title: I like the aspect of the iphone car play but i ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the aspect of the iphone car play but i have to plugin & unplug 2 to 3 times before it will pair up correctly to where i can use the car play
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Whanger

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Car Radio
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for 2008 Toyota FJ Needed add on cradle to fit but works and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin P Sawejka

customer_reviews.title: Great radio with apply CarPlay
customer_reviews.text: Nice radio, but I don’t like it does not have buttons to change song. That isn’t a huge problem unless you’re using your maps and have to switch back to the music player (mostly pandora or amazon music), and then back to maps. If you’re not worried abt that, it’s a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cheap radio
customer_reviews.text: Easy install on my 2006 f250. Be sure to buy the wire harness and face plate kit. Take your time to solder the correct words together. They are color coordinated. Parking brake wire is a non issue thank god. Was worried I’d have to wire it to a switch. Apple play works well
customer_reviews.author: scout001

customer_reviews.title: Terrible display in the sunlight
customer_reviews.text: Mostly this radio is great! But the visibility of the screen is terrible during the daytime compared to my phone. When using a navigation app through CarPlay it's only possible to view the map on the radio, which can be very difficult to see when wearing sunglasses... especially polarized sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Sears

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Replacement Stereo.
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace my car stereo and it was imperative to have one with Apple CarPlay keep my eyes on the road. This was a great deal for the money. Was very easy to install after watching a YouTube video. It sounds great with the factory speakers too. It is easy to use and the interface it great.
customer_reviews.author: Bran0121

customer_reviews.title: Great headunit for the price, has it’s downfalls although.
customer_reviews.text: Alittle lag in between swipes & touches with response But when hooked up directly to my iPhone via USB noticeable difference in swiftness and response Would recommend setting up wiring situation to always plug phone directly into your headunit and utilize the Apple CarPlay. * six months later * I personally realized there’s alittle bit of issues when using wireless Bluetooth especially in the freezing cold weather I’ve had lately. Headunit will act alittle funny, much easier to plug in and allow it to rely off the strength of your phone instead of letting it process everything.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Wesley Crews

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Got it for a good deal for my wife’s car. She loves it! CarPlay works great. Easy to navigate
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Favorite head unit ever (and I’ve owned a lot)
customer_reviews.text: I have now put this unit in both of my vehicles and I couldn’t be happier. The interface is seamless and responsive. Sound quality is great with my factory amplified Bose system (‘06 Sequoia). I use the microphone and added a backup camera which wired in easily once I figured out which wires were which! I’d recommend using Axxess(Metra) interface adapters, their website has a massive database of vehicle-specific instructions and every adapter you could think of for a good price! I was able to maintain factory amp and steering wheels controls with no issues following their instructions along with a YouTube video! Highly recommend this head unit, you won’t regret buying it!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Ball

customer_reviews.title: It is definitely impressive
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are not very useful, so good luck installing it; but it does work great as advertised. I’ve used it with ApplePlay and it has been excellent. The sound quality is also great
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: It's like getting a new car!
customer_reviews.text: Stereo is amazing. If there was one complaint it would be that bluetooth does not activate the Apple Car system but plugging the phone in is no problem. So many sound options and even the DVD player/monitor produces an amazing picture. Had mine professionally installed (recommended) and couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: ldiablo

customer_reviews.title: This is exactly what I was shopping for and the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was shopping for and the price beat my budget. I haven't installed it yet but will follow up with my degree of satisfaction once it's done. Ok now installed and it has all the options I had hoped for. Install went very well and sounds better than OEM. Very responsive easily navigated. Great product for the price. 2nd update: have installed a 2nd one in my 04 explorer with same result. Love it looks OEM, coupled with a Pyle license plate frame back up camera and couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Bickford

customer_reviews.title: Instant Sound Quality Boost
customer_reviews.text: My significant other loves this head unit in her 2010 Dodge Challenger. We could immediately tell a difference in sound quality just with the head unit swap alone. Plenty of personalization options from colors and background designs. The touch screen also responds pretty well after a months use. The biggest downside is the microphone seems like you’ll never get the clean “could be stock” look. It’s an external microphone that needs to be mounted either in the dash, or the steering column, and it is rather large for a car microphone. Does bother us much tho(left the microphone out of the install) Also the volume is “+” and “-“ buttons instead of a dial, but that is purely personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Wickline

customer_reviews.title: Best stereo I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: The stereo works great. Love the apple car play. The sound quality is perfect and the touch screen works fantastic even with leather gloves on. Firmware updates can be a little challenging, but everything else is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Windsor

customer_reviews.title: 2010 Jeep Wrangler jk install
customer_reviews.text: Luckily I watched a lot of YouTube videos. I had to cut out some plastic to fit in the radio. Other than cutting it was pretty straight forward to install and it works great. Bluetooth is fine, I mostly use apple car play but overall great upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: dylan

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Unit is really nice. Sound is very good, however I think there can be improvements. (This could be due to all the advanced settings inside of this unit or my speakers) I think I will be tweaking settings for a bit to get a solid sound. The adjustable lights are nice as you can match other dash lights to make it look stock. For the price point I feel it’s a good deal. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Travis Stone

customer_reviews.title: Nice but be careful
customer_reviews.text: it’s pioneer so the sound is great. But there should be better instructions for us to connect to the car. And I needed to buy multiple cables to connect it. I would normally give 4 or 3 stars but I knew how to connect it and was not a big problem for me and the sound deserves five star. And also navigation is useful with the car play.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good feature pack value radio.
customer_reviews.text: CarPlay works great and the touchscreen is nice and responsive. I have used all of the functions of the iPhone with this radio. Does a good job making phone calls, talking to Siri, navigation and all the other features. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tom & Emily

customer_reviews.title: Super easy installation and I love Apple CarPlay
customer_reviews.text: Super easy installation and I love Apple CarPlay. For a lower end model, this is still packed with features and a really nice screen.
customer_reviews.author: Primelover

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Just replacing the stereo in my Corolla for this one, made the driving experience a whole new adventure. Bought it as a gift for my husband and he loves it more than he loves me.
customer_reviews.author: Tekpro

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife and had it installed in her car.... She absolutely loves it. She uses it everyday and it works great! The sound quality is way better in her car now to the point I want one for my car! We would definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Trey Abbott

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best mods on my 1999 Mazda miata. Extremely user friendly and simple to work with. Apple CarPlay works flawlessly. The only things that could be improved in my opinion are a slightly larger screen and picture quality (looks a bit grainy/pixeled). I know this model is slightly outdated, but it’s been a great addition/improvement for my little car.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: and audio controls are great. Contrary to what I had read
customer_reviews.text: This thing is PACKED with features. The Apple CarPlay was what drew me to it. But the internal crossover, and audio controls are great. Contrary to what I had read, it has the OBD2 display capabilities as well. About the only beef I would have, and it isn't with the unit, is with how the unit sits in the trim kit. It isn't as flush as I would like - but again, that's not the unit's fault.
customer_reviews.author: John T.

customer_reviews.title: The customer support was great & the product shipped fast. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this player as a gift for my 18yo son. He loved the idea of installing it into his 08' Mazda but we had to return it as someone else in the family had already ordered & set up an install date with s local company.
customer_reviews.author: Florida671

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive Apple Carplay
customer_reviews.text: This product is an amazing upgrade from my stock 2010 forester radio, especially for the price. I mainly purchased this for Apple CarPlay, and it’s fantastic. Installation took maybe 45 minutes along with wiring up my separate Metra harness to the radios own harness. One note, remember to order the installation kit and trim so it has the nice finish.
customer_reviews.author: April Frost

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME entry level head unit
customer_reviews.text: i’ve installed it myself in my mitsubishi mirage 2014 (ISRAEL) and i’m very satisfied. i’m using only CarPlay and Bluetooth for calls. it’s works great. but i recommend to everyone to buy the wireless version of carplay. the extra cost worth it for the long term.
customer_reviews.author: Eden

customer_reviews.title: Not quite worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't include a remote. Touch screen is nice. Can't adjust half the settings for some reason. No response from customer service. Sound is OK. Cuts out sometimes like a cd skipping. Screen brightness is decent. Hooked up for DVD and steering wheel controls, no luck getting them to work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap junk
customer_reviews.text: Well not even a year later driving down the road the screen decides to fall apart I’d give 0 rating if I could I’d recommend using a different company
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy another one.
customer_reviews.text: Had it at least a week. Took a 600 mile trip with it and it was still a mystery how to operate it consistently. Very un user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: J. atherton

customer_reviews.title: BEST DOUBLE DIN STEREO
customer_reviews.text: This is the best radio I have ever bought for any of my trucks I got this bc I replaced my stock with another single din touchscreen but it was just awful, the speakers would pop when I played music and just so much more. This double din apple CarPlay stereo is where it is at!!
customer_reviews.author: Grayson

customer_reviews.title: Great Unit
customer_reviews.text: Fit nicely into my 2009 Yaris, just had to get the correct harness and a fitting for the space it leaves. Carplay is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Awesome to add CarPlay to an older vehicle
customer_reviews.text: Love this stereo for the CarPlay feature, That alone was the reason I bought it and it delivered for sure. It was an easy installation with the additional purchase of the wiring harness, very quick and worked right away. Will probably buy another one for other vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I wish I knew was that CarPlay would not work on my car. I have a 2002 Honda Accord the main reason I brought this particular model was for the CarPlay. Other than that there is a bit of extra room around all the sides but so far it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Marelyn posadas-cuaya

customer_reviews.title: READ BEFORE BUYING!
customer_reviews.text: The touch screen requires so much precision and force that it requires you to take your eyes off of the road. The interface looks like it’s from the 90s and it requires you to pair your phone again after every time the car turns on possibly taking several minutes. (On iPhone 11 Pro Max) It will make your speakers louder, but at what cost.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Liuzzo

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and sounds better
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my car, CarPlay intergration is nice but only works through USB, stock player is ok and sound is great. Plenty of options to hookup however you need
customer_reviews.author: Tank the Dog

customer_reviews.title: Really enjoying this radio
customer_reviews.text: I installed this radio 2 weeks ago. I am really enjoying the apple car play. The sound is way better than my previous radio. The Bluetooth function is seamless.I also enjoy the fact that both my phones connect via Bluetooth. It switches back and forth with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Head Unit
customer_reviews.text: In love with this head unit. Just got it installed. Will post photos soon. I installed it onto my 2006 Porsche Cayman. And man, even with stock speakers I was able to utilize the audio settings with this to really improve the sound quality. The apple play is really awesome. Only drawback is that you have to have it plugged in to use the feature. Other than that, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a well designed stereo. There is a lot of settings/ options to customize it to your liking. The Apple CarPlay is great. I'm thinking about buying a second one for my other vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Fort

customer_reviews.title: It does what it’s made for..
customer_reviews.text: Very good system, viewing angles are perfect 👌 screen quality is very good the touch is very responsive auto Bluetooth speed is good not the fastest so is the car play overall very good product. 10/10 no problems so far
customer_reviews.author: TheOperator

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck!!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money, this unit is very responsive to touch, is loaded with features and perfect if you own an iPhone as it has car play. The unit sounds good and the menu’s are well thought out and work seamlessly I highly recommend this unit!
customer_reviews.author: Mario Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Great crossover and a great sound overall, a must have. Interface not so good, it looks like a 2000's website, would need a more sharper interface like mobile phones nowadays (it looks better than Windows Phones, though).
customer_reviews.author: Emilesp

customer_reviews.title: Great price and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great radio and very easy to use. I purchased this radio to upgraded from my 2700. I definitely made the right choice! The price on here is also almost $120 less than major retailers!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great love the Apple CarPlay!! Inexpensive upgrade for the Camry
customer_reviews.text: Installed this radio myself works great for my first time doing this. Did a lot of research on how to hook it up to my 2007 Camry se.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: Installed this into an older truck and it works great. Decent sound. Easy to use display so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, Best price
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing! Came well sealed, with everything included. You do need to purchase the correct wiring harness for your car. And I had a master mechanic install it so I cant say much for ease of installation.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great device.
customer_reviews.text: Radio was easy to install in my 2011 Toyota Tacoma. Has been a great upgrade from the factory radio. Love the CarPlay feature.
customer_reviews.author: Pauly

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, great sound!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome radio! Used this to replace my factory VW radio that died. Great sound, easy to use interface. Really enjoy using this as I drive a long commute to work.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great!  Works as advertised.  Happy customer.
customer_reviews.text: The product does what it advertises. The only thing I wish it had was a mute button, but otherwise it's great. The bluetooth pairing is flawless -- almost everything else I try to pair my phone to has occasional hiccups, but not this thing. I quite like it.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: It works, HOWEVER!!
customer_reviews.text: Its works, HOWEVER.... When my husband installed it into his truck it hooked up a back up camera as well and there is a defective port on it.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney R.

customer_reviews.title: Decent product and fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits great and looks factory . Good value for money . Not too stoked with the am fm reception... the factory radio was far better here , but Apple play is a great feature and I use the usb capability a lot . Very easy install .
customer_reviews.author: Frank C.Wood

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This think is awesome Judith like the one in my Chevy volt. Stop looking this is the Shizit!
customer_reviews.author: VBarnett

customer_reviews.title: NO GPS built into receiver! Bur works great!
customer_reviews.text: Great stereo! The pic is misleading. There is NO GPS with this receiver but if you plug your iphone into it you can use Apple Car Play and use your maps. Great value for the money! The instructions for use are not included!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: good quality, easy way to add apple carplay to my old yukon. definitely woke up the old bose system - sounds better than it ever has.
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Black

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Stereo
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the product. It is a very nice stereo. Touchscreen is very responsive and also plays very nice. Very easy to install. I will recommend this product to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Byron Herrera

customer_reviews.title: I won’t buy another
customer_reviews.text: This thing sucks gotta unplug battery once a week to restart stero
customer_reviews.author: William doyle

customer_reviews.title: easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Radio had the same wire colors as the 12 year old unit I was replacing. Everything works except video playback.
customer_reviews.author: pc

customer_reviews.title: Awesome unit
customer_reviews.text: Love this radio. I use the Apple CarPlay everytime I drive the truck. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: christopher vance

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Love pioneer and this product is another ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Love pioneer and this product is another great example of why I do. The ONLY issue I have with it is the warning screen when you turn the car on for the first time, everytime, it pops up a warning screen. Just kind of an inconvenience. Also, you can only use Apple car play if you are plugged in via usb cable. Yes, I know that is something very small. All of the software is great. No issues at all installing.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Waggoner

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It works fine but it does not fit in my 2002 Ford F-250 even though it says it does. I had to cut the dash to get it to fit. No remote in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: To be honest I didn’t expect much from this radio but wow, I have been pleasantly surprised by it’s capabilities. The interface is extremely user friendly and easy to learn. The audio quality compared to my old factory radio is light years better. Overall the package is well worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: love the carplay
customer_reviews.text: The software is a little slow and laggy but it is a car radio. over all a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Gooboo

customer_reviews.title: Decent unit.
customer_reviews.text: Works ok. It loses synch a lot. And doesn’t power on sometimes. It appears to get confused. But overal I like the unit
customer_reviews.author: Mater Man

customer_reviews.title: Freakin love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: The crossover adjustment functionality is awesome. I wish I would have bought one sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix1776

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sound & Display Quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stereo! Display is very responsive and doesn't feel like some of the cheap touchscreens. I am extremely happy with this stereo and would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: SheilaE

product_meta.title: Pioneer AVH-1300NEX Multimedia DVD Receiver with 6.2" WVGA Display/Apple CarPlay/Built-in Bluetooth/SiriusXM-Ready/AppRadio Mode
product_meta.description: Pioneer AVH-1300NEX Double DIN Multimedia DVD Receiver with 6.2? WVGA Display, Apple CarPlay and Built-in Bluetooth Pioneer’s NEX or networked entertainment experience line of receivers feature an innovative and powerful new user interface which is responsive and highly customizable. The NEX models are designed especially for today’s smart phone driven lifestyle. Apple Carplay The AVH-1300NEX features Apple CarPlay, the smarter, safer and more fun way to use your iPhone in the car. Apple CarPlay gives iPhone users an incredibly intuitive way to make calls, use Maps, listen to music, and access messages with just a word or a touch. The Connect Car With AppRadio Mode, Pioneer has taken the technology from our revolutionary, game-changing AppRadio and placed it in the AVH-1300NEX so you can experience control of compatible apps directly on your dash! When connected to an iPhone 5 or newer, or compatible Android smartphone with the correct interface cable (sold separately) and loaded with Pioneer’s free AppRadio application, you can enjoy full on-screen access and control of your contacts, calendar, maps, and more! The intuitive interface is formatted and designed specifically for safer in-vehicle operation. AppRadioLIVE AppRadioLIVE simplifies your drive by combining the information you need during your commute into a single, simple to use interface. It’s YOUR digital lifestyle connected. It was specifically designed based on feedback from our current AppRadio customers and offers quick and easy access to personalized information needed in the in-vehicle environment including: Maps, Media, News and Calendar.
feature_bullets: Double DIN 6.2" VGA touchscreen - Power Output: Peak: 50 watts x 4 channels - RMS: 22 watts x 4 channels

specifications.Media Playback Supported: AAC, FLAC, MPEG, MP3, WMA, WAV, Avi, DivX, JPEG, CD, DVD, CarPlay, SiriEyes, BT, Pandora, AppRadio, Spotify
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars940 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
